files.description: Python script that generates outputs/CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md with inclusion/exclusion criteria, scoring rubric, and taxonomy-mapped tagging rules derived from consolidated project context.
Centralized context/constants module that captures relevant consolidated workflow and agent insights used to populate the rubric content deterministically.
Defines the project taxonomy and provides mapping helpers for rubric tagging rules to ensure tags align with approved categories and naming conventions.
Markdown rendering utilities to build a consistent, schema-driven CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md with headings, tables, and examples.
Generated rubric document specifying inclusion/exclusion criteria, scoring dimensions (impact, relevance, authoritative media URLs, rights clarity), and tagging rules mapped to the taxonomy.

missionDescription: Create /outputs/CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md with inclusion/exclusion criteria, scoring (impact, relevance to themes, availability of authoritative media URLs, rights clarity), and tagging rules that map to the taxonomy.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker

Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Improves strategic value of exploration by ensuring exemplars are selected via consistent criteria (importance, representativeness, evidence strength), aligning with 'top case-studies first' and preve...
projectName: /outputs/CASE_STUDY_RUBRIC.md with inclusion/exclusion criteria, scoring (impact, relevance to themes, availability of authoritative media URLs, rights clarity), and tagging rules that map to the taxonomy.
